channel.title: Can Someone Help Me With The BackGround and pictures that are on my Client?
channel.description: hey guys i dont know how to change the pictures on my client, for example, the loading screen and the login screen in the back. there's a picture that i want to change to mine, and the inventory i want to change has a picture aswell. Please let me know, and if you no and want to, add me on MSN if you can to help me out with it. Thanks Guys!
